name: Hectic Highway!
description:
Hello everyone, my name is Flumplez and I have just recently started with 3D game development and this is my first attempt at a 3D game, which I will also later be making available for mobile platforms. The controls are A for left and D for right. The aim of the game is to see how far you can get without dying and what the highest score you can get is - feel free to comment these below. Hope you enjoy my first 3D indie game!

You can donate to support me here at: https://www.peachpay.me/Flumplez
